abstract: The Internet company could be worth more carved up and refocused.
snippet: The Internet company could be worth more carved up and refocused.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo’s resistance to selling its Asian businesses is futile. The Internet company lacks direction. Its stock now trades at about half the $31-a-share offer from Microsoft that it spurned two years ago. Revenue has stagnated. And there’s friction with its partner in China. Yahoo would be worth more carved up and refocused.

headline.main: For Yahoo, Finding Value in Asian Parts
headline.print_headline: For Yahoo, Finding Value in Asian Parts

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
